hero.title: Chess School
hero.description: Learn, play, and master the art of chess. A complete platform to improve your skills, analyze your games, and progress at your own pace.

personalizedTraining.title: Personalized training
personalizedTraining.description: Improve your skills with tactical exercises adapted to your level. Various problems to progress quickly and effectively.

localGames.title: Local games
localGames.description: Play against a friend on the same device. Perfect for practice, teaching, or simply enjoying a game of chess anytime.

gameAnalysis.title: Game analysis
gameAnalysis.description: Import your games in PGN format and analyze them in depth. Identify your mistakes and discover the best alternatives for each position.

openings.title: Opening library
openings.description: Explore our large collection of chess openings. Learn the principles, variations, and strategies associated with each opening.

getStarted.title: Ready to become a better chess player?
getStarted.description: Join our community of passionate players and start your journey toward chess mastery. All the tools you need are at your fingertips.

localGame.title: Local game
localGame.description: Play chess on the same device. White moves first, then players alternate. Move pieces by dragging them to the desired square.
